title: Chinese mushroom soup
ingredients: ['60g unsalted butter', '1 head pak choi, chopped', '450g white and crimini mushrooms, cut into quarters', '4 spring onions, sliced', '2 tablespoons minced garlic, or more to taste', '8 slices fresh ginger, quartered', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '1.75L chicken stock', '25g chopped fresh coriander']
